Author: jl777c#5810
Content: this is made by copying customcc.* and making a BUILD_GAMESCC #ifdefs

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: right now there is just two rpc calls, rng and rngnext

Author: jl777c#5810
Content:
rng is passed in a blockhash and playerid (defaults to 0, max 254) and it returns the initial rng value (and last)
you can then call rngnext with the prior rng, up to maxrng times

Author: TwilightPunkster K64#7533
Content: Awesome

Author: jl777c#5810
Content:
./c cclib rng 17 \"[%229433dc3749aece1bd568f374a45da3b0bc6856990d7da3cd175399577940a775%22,250]\"
{
    "playerid": 250,
    "seed": 1398876319979341887,
    "rng": 14565767519458298868,
    "lastrng": 15075236803740723044,
    "maxrngs": 10000,
    "result": "success"
}
 ./c cclib rngnext 17 \"[14565767519458298868]\"
 {
 "seed": 14565767519458297856,
 "rng": 4253087318999719449,
 "result": "success"
 }
 
 The idea is for a game to start with a near future blockhash, so the lobby gets players signed up until just prior to the designated height. then that blockhash can be used to create a stream of rngs.
 
 the same initial rng can be used for all players, if the identical starting condition is required. up to 255 different initial rng can be derived from a single blockhash. (Actually any number is possible, for simplicity rng rpc limits to 255).
 
 you will notice maxrngs and lastrng, the lastrng is the rng value that will happen after maxrng iterations of calling rngnext with the current rng. This allows making time based multiplayer games where all the nodes can validate all the other nodes rng, even without realtime synchronization of all user input events.
 
 Every time period, all players would set their rng value to the lastrng value. The only thing to be careful of is it not exceed the maxrng calls to rngnext in a single time period. otherwise the same set of rng numbers will be repeated.

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: @Alright i got low level messages working, so now in realtime users will be committing to keystrokes prior to the keystrokes tx and in order to complete a bailout tx would need to get both confirmation from other nodes that they did commit to the keystrokes in realtime and also if anybody catches the bogus keystrokes, they can claim the bailout amount. dont have that logic yet, but that is the concept I am working toward

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so some payment for attestors who attest that the keystrokes tx were realtime broadcast ahead of time and the ability for any contradictory keystroke to allow the claimant to get the gold/playerdata

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: once this works, no more keystrokes reorging (or even suppressing) as it will be timestamped and only allow for some small delay

Author: Alright#0419
Content: Ah I explained it once before. It's a bit strange to explain. Basically, you'd deposit some KMD to the gateway, receive some of the temporary coin in return. The chain itself would emit additional coins. When you go to withdraw, the exchange rate to KMD would be based on how many coins were emitted while you had coins on it

Author: Alright#0419
Content: So like if 2 people deposit 10 KMD each and the chain is emitting 1 coin per minute, 10 minutes later there is 30 of the gateway chain, but only 20 real KMD that can be withdrawed

Author: Alright#0419
Content: and the exchange rate would be 2/3

Author: Alright#0419
Content: when you go back to KMD

Content: automated and variable exchange rate, so it starts worth 1:1 but it gets diluated based on chain emission
